Annotation.String: The Key schema describes sensitive data for accessing devices or services.
This resource shall represent a key for a Redfish implementation.
The string for the key.
This property shall contain the key, and the format shall follow the requirements specified by the KeyType property value.
The format of the key.
This property shall contain the format type for the key.
NVMe-oF specific properties.
This property shall contain NVMe-oF specific properties for this key. This property shall be present if KeyType contains the value `NVMeoF`.
The available actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
An NVMe-oF key.
This value shall indicate the format of the key is defined by one of the NVMe specifications.
An SSH public key.
This value shall indicate the format of the key is defined by one of the SSH public key formats as defined in, but not limited to, RFC4253, RFC4716, or RFC8709.
NVMe-oF specific properties.
This type shall contain NVMe-oF specific properties for a key.
The NVMe Qualified Name (NQN) of the host or target subsystem associated with this key.

This property shall contain the NVMe Qualified Name (NQN) of the host or target subsystem associated with this key. The value of this property shall follow the NQN format defined by the NVMe Base Specification.
The security protocol that this key uses.
This property shall contain the security protocol that this key uses. The value shall be derived from the contents of the KeyString property.
The OEM security protocol that this key uses.

This property shall contain the OEM-defined security protocol that this key uses. The value shall be derived from the contents of the KeyString property. This property shall be present if SecurityProtocolType contains the value `OEM`.
The secure hash algorithms allowed with the usage of this key.

This property shall contain the secure hash algorithms allowed with the usage of this key. An empty list or the absence of this property shall indicate any secure hash algorithms are allowed with this key.
The identifier of the host key paired with this target key.

This property shall contain the value of the Id property of the Key resource representing the host key paired with this target key. An empty string shall indicate the key is not paired. This property shall be absent for host keys.
The NVMe security protocols that a key protects.
This enumeration shall list the NVMe security protocols that a key protects.
Diffie-Hellman Hashed Message Authentication Code Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (DH-HMAC-CHAP).
This value shall indicate the Diffie-Hellman Hashed Message Authentication Code Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (DH-HMAC-CHAP) as defined by the NVMe Base Specification.
Transport Layer Security Pre-Shared Key (TLS PSK).
This value shall indicate Transport Layer Security Pre-Shared Key (TLS PSK) as defined by the NVMe TCP Transport Specification.
This value shall indicate an OEM-defined security protocol. The OEMSecurityProtocolType property shall contain the specific OEM protocol.
The NVMe secure hash algorithms that a key is allowed to use.
This enumeration shall list the NVMe secure hash algorithms that a key is allowed to use.
This value shall indicate the SHA-256 hash function as defined by the 'DH-HMAC-CHAP hash function identifiers' figure in the NVMe Base Specification.
This value shall indicate the SHA-384 hash function as defined by the 'DH-HMAC-CHAP hash function identifiers' figure in the NVMe Base Specification.
This value shall indicate the SHA-512 hash function as defined by the 'DH-HMAC-CHAP hash function identifiers' figure in the NVMe Base Specification.
The available actions for this resource.
This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.
The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This version was created to add `SSH` to KeyType.
A user-defined string to describe this key.
This property shall contain a user-provided string that describes the key.
